nodes.text: Commissioner was the title of the commander of the Coruscant Security Force during the later years of the Galactic Empire's control of Coruscant and after the New Republic captured the planet.
In the aftermath Anti-Sith conspiracy, the position of Commissioner had replaced the previous position of Commander of Coruscant Security.

After the New Republic captured Coruscant from the Empire in 7 ABY, the New Republic Provisional Council believed that former Moff Fliry Vorru wanted the position. However, they quickly decided against it and Vorru also declined to accept the position.
The title of Commissioner was first mentioned in X-Wing: The Krytos Trap.
